key.name: toggle-recording
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to toggle voice recording via voxputd. First press starts recording; second press stops and transcribes.

key.name: show-transcript-notification
key.description: Display a GNOME notification when transcription completes.

key.name: daemon-auto-start
key.description: Automatically start voxputd if it is not already running when the extension activates.
